migrate_legacy_connection.title: Legacy connection entry detected
migrate_legacy_connection.description:
Your connection from **{station_from}** to **{station_to}** is using an outdated configuration format.

Click the 'Submit' button below to automatically migrate this connection to the new format. This will:
- Preserve all your settings (stations, options, etc.)
- Use the new subentry system for better organization
- Remove the old configuration entry

Your connection will continue to work normally after the migration.

confirm.title: Migrate legacy connection
confirm.description: This will migrate your connection to the new format. The migration is automatic and your settings will be preserved.

error.migration_failed: Migration failed. Please try again or reconfigure the connection manually.

migrate_legacy_connection_invalid.title: Invalid legacy connection entry detected
migrate_legacy_connection_invalid.description:
Your connection entry **{entry_title}** is using an outdated configuration format, but the station data is no longer valid.

Please delete this entry and add the connection again using the current interface.
